contributionsSummary.contributions:
**Functional Purpose**: Section header for the contributions summary
**UI Location**: Profile page → Contributions section header
**When Users See This**: When viewing the Contributions section on a profile page
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Contributions"
contributionsSummary.seeHandleContributi:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to view a specific user's contributions
**UI Location**: Profile page → Contributions section (bottom link)
**When Users See This**: When viewing another user's profile and seeing the contributions summary
**Technical Context**: Variable `handle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "See %{handle}'s contributions"
contributionsSummary.seeYourContribution:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to view the current user's contributions
**UI Location**: Profile page → Contributions section (bottom link)
**When Users See This**: When viewing their own profile and seeing the contributions summary
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "See your contributions"
